mapper.select: SELECT fd.fd_code, fd.user_id, m.user_id, f.food_name, fd.grams, fd.meal_type, fd.reg_dt, f.st_grams, f.cal, f.carb, f.fat, f.prot, f.na FROM food_diary fd INNER JOIN food f ON fd.food_name = f.food_name INNER JOIN membership m ON fd.user_id = m.user_id WHERE fd.user_id = #{userId} AND TRUNC(fd.reg_dt) = TO_DATE(#{regDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY fd.meal_type ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT FD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO food_diary ( fd_code, user_id, food_name, grams, meal_type, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{fdCode}, #{userId}, #{foodName}, #{grams}, #{mealType}, #{regDt} )

INSERT INTO food_diary SELECT FD_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS fd_code, 'user01' AS userId, '김치볶음밥' AS foodName, 10 AS grams, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 3), 0, '아침', 1, '점심', '저녁') AS mealType, TO_DATE(DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 2), 0, '2025-06-25', '2025-06-22'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 502
